Open infrastructure for an open economy

Zeppelin creates systems, tools and protocols to promote global economic freedom. We also provide security services to aid the community in growing on solid foundations.

The challenges of building decentralized networks

Security

The challenge for security professionals is to rethink the 'castle & moat' approach to perimeter-based security and reconsider security holistically across the dynamic, distributed fleet.

Developer experience

The challenge for architects and developers is to accommodate the necessary diversity of application platforms across a distributed fleet.

Operations

The challenge for op. teams moving to cloud is to enable the automation through infrastructure as code while embracing the inevitable heterogeneity of different cloud providers.

Your blueprint for decentralized systems

We are focused on setting standards and building open-source technology to close the gap between our vision and the reality of how decentralized networks work today.

We set ever-higher standards for the industry

In-depth system security audits

In an economy where software code powers real money, security is a top priority. We specialize in auditing high-impact smart contract systems.
